statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); branch=$(git -C "$cwd" branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); ctx=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.used_percentage // 0' | cut -d. -f1); out=''; [ "$ctx" -gt 20 ] && out="${ctx}%"; [ -n "$branch" ] && [ "$branch" != "main" ] && [ "$branch" != "master" ] && { [ -n "$out" ] && out="$branch | $out" || out="$branch"; }; printf '%s' "$out"
